      Returns:

    • setActiveSubs

      public void setActiveSubs(int activeSubs)
      This Java function sets the value of the "activeSubs" variable.
      Parameters:
      activeSubs - The parameter activeSubs is an integer value representing the number of active subscriptions. The method sets the value of the instance variable activeSubs to the provided parameter value.

    • updateActiveSubs

      public void updateActiveSubs(int newSubs)
      This Java function updates the number of active subscriptions by adding the value of new subscriptions to the current number of active subscriptions.
      Parameters:
      newSubs - The parameter "newSubs" is an integer value representing the number of new subscribers that need to be added to the existing number of active subscribers.

    • setSubscribeCost

      public void setSubscribeCost(double subscribeCost)
      This function sets the cost of subscription for a certain object.
      Parameters:
      subscribeCost - The parameter `subscribeCost` is a double type variable that represents the cost of subscribing to a service or product. The `setSubscribeCost` method is used to set the value of this variable.

    • newSub

      public void newSub()
      The function increments the number of active subscriptions.
